trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将要处理 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The handler is not required to perform any action, and your code should avoid generating exceptions or allowing exceptions to propagate to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序不需要执行任何操作，并且你的代码应该避免产生异常或允许异常传播到调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that do reach the caller are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 不要访问调用方的任何异常将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The handler may use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs> to influence the processing of the updates.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序可能使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs>来影响更新的处理。

trans-unit.source: For example, the handler may opt to skip the update of the current row or skip the update of all remaining rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，该处理程序可以选择跳过对当前行的更新或跳过所有剩余行的更新。

trans-unit.source: Note that the rows are updated in the order that they were received from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 请注意这些行进行更新，它们已从数据源收到的顺序。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs> 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
